comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: This vessel was sunk during WW2 by the German pocket battleship Admiral Scheer: news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1946&dat=19410224&... It is listed on the Canadian Merchant Navy Memorial: www.cdli.ca/monuments/ns/merchant.htm Among the cargoes it was listed as having carried in the 1930s was passion fruit from Australia: news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1946&dat=19310903&...
